clients.title: Get the Google My Business Mobile App
description: Business owners can access their Google My Business (GMB) accounts on the go using the Google My Business app for iOS and Android. Now you can easily track, manage, and edit your business information on Google. With the GMB app, you get real-time notifications about reviews, messages and updates. Additionally, you can create and publish content by using the Google Posts feature. Read Google’s documentation on the GMB app here:

jld.title: Make a Resolution to Complete Your Profile This Year!
description: 2019 is here and you should make sure your profile is up-to-date. Here are some tips for completing your profile.
Include Any Missing Details of Your Professional Expertise:
descriptionCont: Also, don’t miss out on your chance to showcase your Justia Lawyer Rating badge on your websites, blogs, and other properties!
